document.full_text: former world number one andy roddick was dumped out in the first round of the madrid open on monday, upset 6-4 6-7 6-3 by qualifier flavio cipolla.
document.title: roddick's madrid bid ended by qualifier cipolla
lines_and_colors: former world number one andy roddick was dumped out in the first round of the madrid open on monday, upset 6-4 6-7 6-3 by qualifier flavio cipolla.
